video.title: Psych
video.synopsis: Shawn Spencer appears to possess a nearly supernatural gift for crime-solving -- so much so that the police begin employing his services as a psychic.

episodes.synopsis: When the Santa Barbara police department hit a wall on a high-profile kidnapping case, they reluctantly hire Shawn Spencer, the town's newest psychic detective, to help solve the crime.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus investigate the mysterious death of the spellmaster at the regional spelling bee.
episodes.title: The Spellingg Bee

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus crash a high society wedding in order to recover the stolen priceless antique engagement ring before the ceremony ends.
episodes.title: Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Piece

episodes.synopsis: Shawn must communicate with the spirit world in order to recover a dead bank robber's stolen cash and save his widow's life.
episodes.title: Woman Seeking Dead Husband, Smokers Okay, No Pets

episodes.synopsis: When Shawn is the only one to realize a suicide is in fact a murder, he keeps himself on the case by insisting he's getting information from the sole witness: the victim's cat.
episodes.title: 9 Lives

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus become Civil War reenactors when a carefully choreographed "death" turns out to be a real-life murder.
episodes.title: Weekend Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus must save a man who claims a ghost is trying to kill him.
episodes.title: Who Ya Gonna Call?

episodes.synopsis: A teenager goes missing, and to Gus's delight, he and Shawn must spend the entire weekend at the boy's last known location -- the Santa Barbara Comic-Con -- investigating his disappearance.
episodes.title: Shawn Vs. the Red Phantom

episodes.synopsis: When Henry's former boss, Capt. Connors, now suffering from early on-set Alzheimer's, knows he's solved a crime but can't remember it, he comes to Shawn for help.
episodes.title: Forget Me Not

episodes.synopsis: When a drunken and depressed Lassiter confesses to Shawn that he has doubts about the death by "natural causes" of an astronomer, Shawn sets out to secretly prove the detective right in order to boost his morale.
episodes.title: From the Earth to the Starbucks

episodes.synopsis: As a joke, Lassiter sticks Shawn with a case where a man shows up naked at the police station, claiming to have been abducted by aliens -- but Shawn's investigation soon takes in him into an even stranger universe: speed dating.
episodes.title: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not, He Loves Me, Oops He's Dead!

episodes.synopsis: When a woman sleeps with a beloved local weatherman but wakes up to find him dead, she is charged with his murder. Shawn finds a way into the case by becoming a consultant to the defense.
episodes.title: Cloudy...with a Chance of Murder

episodes.synopsis: Before the Psych Agency can begin to investigate the disappearance of an up-and-coming tennis star, Shawn must first retrieve Gus from a corporate retreat. They soon realize things are not always as they appear.
episodes.title: Game, Set...Muuurder?

episodes.synopsis: Henry's old friend, Bill Peterson, refuses to call the police after his wayward son steals from him and then goes missing, which forces Henry to go find help in the last place he ever wanted to visit.
episodes.title: Poker? I Barely Know Her

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus step into a real-life urban legend as they investigate a death suspiciously like the tale of "Scary Sherry."
episodes.title: Scary Sherry: Bianca's Toast

episodes.synopsis: The judge on an "American Idol"-esque show finds himself in a panic after a series of near-miss attempts on his life and hires the Psych Agency to protect him from future harm.
episodes.title: American Duos

episodes.synopsis: Shawn contends that a dead man was killed in a manner that misses the agreed death timeline -- by about 65 million years.
episodes.title: Sixty Five Million Years Off

episodes.synopsis: The feds show up to investigate a counterfeiter and bring along their own version of Shawn.
episodes.title: Psy vs. Psy

episodes.synopsis: Shawn thinks he's solved Lassiter's stolen car case but soon begins to doubt himself.
episodes.title: Zero to Murder in 60 Seconds

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus's old nemesis returns when he hires them to find out why his horses always lose at the track.
episodes.title: And Down to the Stretch Comes Murder

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus try to clear the name of a chef accused of killing a food critic.
episodes.title: Meat Is Murder, But Murder Is Also Murder

episodes.synopsis: A group of genius teenagers go to the Psych Agency claiming their teacher is a murderer.
episodes.title: If You're So Smart Then Why Are You Dead

episodes.synopsis: A Santa Barbara burglar is hitting people's homes in the middle of the day.
episodes.title: Rob-A-Bye Baby

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus play bounty hunters in pursuit of an escaped accused murderer.
episodes.title: Bounty Hunters!

episodes.synopsis: Gus brings Shawn along to his parents' house for Christmas dinner, only to have Mr. Guster wind up being the top suspect in a neighbor's murder.
episodes.title: Gus' Dad May Have Killed an Old Guy

episodes.synopsis: Shawn's world is turned upside-down during a missing-person case that comes from an unexpected client: Gus's wife.
episodes.title: There's Something About Mira

episodes.synopsis: It's youth versus experience when Shawn and Gus team up with Henry to investigate a man's disappearance from a local retirement community.
episodes.title: The Old and the Restless

episodes.synopsis: On the set of Santa Barbara's most popular Spanish soap opera, life imitates art when a fictional murder turns real, making everyone involved a suspect. Shawn solves the crime from the inside while inadvertently becoming one of the show's stars.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera...Homicidio

episodes.synopsis: When a member of a local brotherhood dies during an initiation ritual, Shawn and Gus enter a world of secret handshakes and ancient traditions, all presided over by Lassiter's father-in-law.
episodes.title: Dis-Lodged

episodes.synopsis: It's Fashion Week in Santa Barbara, and all around town it's models, parties and death by electrocution? Shawn and Gus go undercover as male models to investigate the murder of a prominent designer.
episodes.title: Black and Tan: A Crime of Fashion

episodes.synopsis: Shawn is called to the Natural History Museum when a mummy goes missing and all indications are that it got up and walked out on its own.
episodes.title: Shawn (And Gus) of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: After Gus's boss demands he quit moonlighting at the Psych Agency, Shawn must find a way to keep his partner while solving a haunting case -- and playing referee to Henry and his recently returned mother.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Gus has worked long and hard organizing their high school reunion, so when Shawn claims one of their fellow alumni has been murdered and his body has been hidden, Gus refuses to believe him.
episodes.title: Murder?...Anyone?...Anyone?...Bueller?

episodes.synopsis: While watching a daredevil's motorcycle jump at a fair, Shawn realizes someone is sabotaging his stunts. Shawn and Gus talk their way into his inner circle in order to find out who's trying to kill him.
episodes.title: Daredevils!!

episodes.synopsis: When Shawn's adventurous and notoriously unreliable Uncle Jack comes to town claiming he has a map to ancient hidden Spanish treasure, Shawn, Gus and Henry find themselves in a life-or-death chase to the gold.
episodes.title: Greatest Adventure in the History of Basic Cable

episodes.synopsis: The biggest bust of Henry's career just walked out of jail on a technicality, so Shawn and Gus must revisit the 1970s to reinvestigate the case and put the culprit behind bars for good.
episodes.title: Disco Didn't Die. It Was Murdered!

episodes.synopsis: A death on an off-shore oil rig leads to a jurisdictional battle between Vick and her Coast Guard Commander sister -- not only over the case, but also over the services of Santa Barbara's leading psychic detective.
episodes.title: There Might Be Blood

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus help an undercover Juliet solve a string of robberies connected to a roller derby team, which she has recently infiltrated as their newest member.
episodes.title: Talk Derby To Me

episodes.synopsis: After Gus finds himself held hostage in a bank, Shawn must not only find a way to get inside, but also to become the gunman's chief negotiator.
episodes.title: Gus Walks Into a Bank..

episodes.synopsis: After Shawn and Gus help a little girl get a mall Santa out of jail in time for Christmas, they realize their clients are con men who have a big score planned.
episodes.title: Christmas Joy

episodes.synopsis: When Shabby the Sea Lion is found dead after being released into the wild, Shawn sets out to prove it was murder and stumbles onto a bigger conspiracy.
episodes.title: Six Feet Under the Sea

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus must prove Lassiter's innocence when he's on the hook for a murder inside of the Santa Barbara Police Department.
episodes.title: Lassie Did a Bad, Bad Thing

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus join up with a local firehouse to prove a series of arsons are more than they seem.
episodes.title: Earth, Wind and...Wait for It..

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus go undercover at a professional football training camp when the foot of the team's missing kicker is discovered.
episodes.title: Any Given Friday Night At 10PM, 9PM Central

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus must prove a pathological liar is telling the truth in order to stop an assassination plot.
episodes.title: Truer Lies

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus are hired by a childhood friend to find a missing camp counselor who disappeared near their old campgrounds. Upon their arrival, spooky activity abounds.
episodes.title: Tuesday the 17th

episodes.synopsis: After eluding capture and disappearing years ago, the famed Yin Yang serial killer is back, and he's set his sights on Shawn.
episodes.title: An Evening with Mr. Yang

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus track an elusive international art thief while vacationing in Canada.
episodes.title: Extradition: British Columbia

episodes.synopsis: When a billionaire crashes his small plane in the woods, Shawn and Gus join the search to find the wreckage, but they arrive only in time to hear his last words -- he was murdered.
episodes.title: He Dead

episodes.synopsis: When strange things start happening at Old Sonora Town -- a simulated Old West tourist attraction -- that threaten to permanently shut it down, Lassiter enlists Shawn and Gus's help to uncover the truth and keep a childhood favorite open.
episodes.title: High Noon-ish

episodes.synopsis: A priest and former teacher of Shawn and Gus calls them claiming that an apparent suicide was in fact the work of the devil.
episodes.title: The Devil is in the Details and in the Upstairs Bedroom

episodes.synopsis: After a cop bar is shot up in an apparent robbery, Shawn realizes the shooter was actually targeting one of them.
episodes.title: Shawn Gets the Yips

episodes.synopsis: A man needs Shawn and Gus's help to lift a curse on him that seems to put all of his girlfriends in mortal danger.
episodes.title: Bollywood Homicide

episodes.synopsis: Gus must reteam with his estranged college singing buddies when a member of the old quartet is murdered.
episodes.title: High Top Fade Out

episodes.synopsis: A man fears he is dangerous to society and enlists Shawn and Gus's help because, he claims, he is a werewolf.
episodes.title: Let's Get Hairy

episodes.synopsis: Shawn's life hangs in the balance when, while working on a case involving an ice cream truck, he stumbles onto something bigger and more deadly.
episodes.title: Shawn Takes a Shot in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Shawn tangles with the Army when he claims that a private's suicide was actually murder and suspects that Juliet's former military/current mercenary brother is involved.
episodes.title: You Can't Handle this Episode

episodes.synopsis: When Shawn and Gus join Gus's new girlfriend on a rafting trip, a member of the group goes overboard, but Shawn quickly realizes it was no accident.
episodes.title: Thrill Seekers and Hell Raisers

episodes.synopsis: When Juliet asks Gus to help her track down an old boyfriend, she inadvertently exposes a dark and closely guarded secret.
episodes.title: A Very Juliet Episode

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus must recover a deadly pathogen before the thief releases it into the city.
episodes.title: Death Is in the Air

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus are recruited into a think tank to help prevent the murder of a business tycoon, but once the group disbands, they realize that one of the members plans to use the assassination ideas to kill the client instead of save him.
episodes.title: Think Tank

episodes.synopsis: After Lassiter takes a page out of Shawn's book and claims a shark attack victim was actually murdered, the guys must then scramble to find the fish and prove him right.
episodes.title: Head, The Tail, the Whole Damn Episode

episodes.synopsis: A killer targets Shawn using scenarios from classic Alfred Hitchcock films. Ally Sheedy guest stars.
episodes.title: Mr. Yin Presents...

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus find themselves caught between two rival Chinese Triad families as they search for one of the leaders' abducted daughter.
episodes.title: Romeo and Juliet and Juliet

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is found dead with a bottle of pills that are lab trial samples, Lassiter and Gus team up to catch the murderer.
episodes.title: Feet, Don't Kill Me Now

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus get themselves hired onto the case when an unstable lawyer claims his assistant was abducted by aliens.
episodes.title: Not Even Close, Encounters

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy widow's young date is murdered, pitting Shawn and Gus against a dirty rotten scoundrel.
episodes.title: Chivalry is Not Dead but Someone is

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus infiltrate a ring of street-racing car thieves to catch a killer.
episodes.title: Shawn And Gus In Drag (Racing)

episodes.synopsis: Two former cops come out of retirement to help Shawn and Gus solve the murder of a former police chief.
episodes.title: Viagra Falls

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus help a prison guard locate his escaped inmates on a ferry boat headed to the Channel Islands.
episodes.title: Ferry Tale

episodes.synopsis: While on a murder case involving victims on a liver transplant donor list, Shawn meets a man whose criminal profiling skills rival his own.
episodes.title: Shawn 2.0

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus find themselves in the midst of a chase after a government spy seeks their help in clearing her name.
episodes.title: One, Maybe Two, Ways Out

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus return to Vancouver to visit their old nemesis, Despereaux, in prison at the felon's request, who then uses them to escape.
episodes.title: Extradition II: The Actual Extradition Part

episodes.synopsis: While on the haunted house ride at Santa Barbara's Scare Fest, Shawn and Gus witness a murder.
episodes.title: In Plain Fright

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus receive a mysterious email inviting them to the Cinnamon Festival in Dual Spires, a quirky town that's nearly invisible on a map.
episodes.title: Dual Spires

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus help the SBPD solve a case but are soon reprimanded for their efforts because they did not follow police procedure.
episodes.title: We'd Like to Thank the Academy

episodes.synopsis: Shawn's antics cause evidence to be thrown out in the high-profile prosecution of a known crime lord named Czarsky.
episodes.title: The Polarizing Express

episodes.synopsis: After the zoo's polar bear trainer is murdered unexpectedly, officials are quick to point the finger at the polar bear.
episodes.title: Dead Bear Walking

episodes.synopsis: The Yin/Yang trilogy comes to a close as Shawn and Gus race to save a woman kidnapped by Yin.
episodes.title: Yang 3 in 2D

episodes.synopsis: Shawn discovers a dead body while sneaking into the home of a British ambassador on other business.
episodes.title: Shawn Rescues Darth Vader

episodes.synopsis: The guys wake up after a night of drinking with no memory of what happened. Somehow, a man ended up dead and Lassister's gun is missing bullets.
episodes.title: Last Night Gus

episodes.synopsis: When a body is found drained of its blood, Shawn theorizes that the man was attacked by a vampire.
episodes.title: This Episode Sucks

episodes.synopsis: A masked vigilante known as the Mantis one-ups Shawn and Lassiter by striking out at a local crime syndicate.
episodes.title: The Amazing Psych-Man and Tap-Man Issue #2

episodes.synopsis: Gus goes undercover as a mascot for Santa Barbara's minor league baseball team while investigating the death of a coach.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Curveball

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus go undercover in a psychiatric hospital to debunk a billionaire's insanity defense.
episodes.title: Shawn Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: Shawn sets up a reunion between Juliet and her estranged father, who ends up working a case with them.
episodes.title: In For a Penny..

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus head to a hippie commune to protect a woman who claims she witnessed a murder -- but no one seems to believe her.
episodes.title: The Tao of Gus

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Juliet's romantic getaway sours when they're robbed ... and a dead body turns up.
episodes.title: Neil Simon's Lover's Retreat

episodes.synopsis: Despereaux returns to help Shawn and Gus catch a thief who stole valuable artifacts from a museum -- but there's a much bigger mystery at play.
episodes.title: Indiana Shawn And The Temple Of The Kinda Crappy, Rusty Old Dagger - Extended Version

episodes.synopsis: Strange things start to happen when Lassiter moves into a new condo, so he hires Shawn and Gus to investigate.
episodes.title: Heeeeee's Lassie - Extended Version

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus go undercover on a reality dating series after a contestant is involved in a suspicious car accident.
episodes.title: Shawn and the Real Girl

episodes.synopsis: Someone tries to kill the founder of a program for at-risk youth at a benefit where Gus and his former a cappella group are performing.
episodes.title: Let's Doo-Wop It Again

episodes.synopsis: When a mortician discovers that Woody made a mistake on an autopsy, Shawn and Gus step in to try to save his job.
episodes.title: Autopsy Turvy

episodes.synopsis: After a chef wrongly accused of armed robbery is exonerated, he hires Shawn and Gus to find the real culprit.
episodes.title: True Grits

episodes.synopsis: Shawn discovers a body that's connected to an unsolved case his father was investigating 20 years earlier.
episodes.title: Santabarbaratown

episodes.synopsis: After Henry takes a bullet to the chest and is rushed to the hospital, Shawn seeks revenge on the shooter and everyone else involved in the scandal.
episodes.title: Santabarbaratown 2

episodes.synopsis: Gus gets a girlfriend, and Juliet goes undercover on an online dating site to catch a killer while Shawn tries to holster his jealousy.
episodes.title: Juliet Takes a Luvvah

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus join a pair of college students in the woods who are filming a documentary on Bigfoot.
episodes.title: Lassie Jerky

episodes.synopsis: Shawn attempts to bond with Juliet's stepfather, Lloyd, a seemingly harmless accountant.
episodes.title: No Country for Two Old Men

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus attend a party hosted by an aging rockstar, a man the SBPD arrested years ago for a murder he doesn't remember committing.
episodes.title: 100 Clues

episodes.synopsis: After Gus is tasked with taking care of his girlfriend's son for the day, he jeopardizes their relationship when a trip to the circus turns deadly.
episodes.title: Cirque Du Soul

episodes.synopsis: The gang spends the weekend at a casino resort for a wedding and crosses paths with a crime boss whose presence jeopardizes the impending nuptials.
episodes.title: Deez Nups

episodes.synopsis: Shawn solves a case involving a mysterious Swedish woman and imagines how the same case would have been solved had he done one thing differently.
episodes.title: Right Turn or Left for Dead

episodes.synopsis: Shawn bonds with Woody, and Juliet befriends a girl Shawn believes is a killer.
episodes.title: Juliet Wears the Pantsuit

episodes.synopsis: After the mayor dies in what appears to be a surfing accident, Shawn investigates and ends up running for mayor himself.
episodes.title: The Santa Barbarian Candidate

episodes.synopsis: After Gus accidentally tampers with the crime scene where his boss was killed, Shawn helps him find the real murderer before Gus is arrested.
episodes.title: Office Space

episodes.synopsis: After Shawn and Gus's favorite radio DJ is murdered, they go undercover as on-air personalities to find his killer.
episodes.title: Dead Air

episodes.synopsis: After a woman dies from what appears to be a plastic surgery mishap, Shawn and Gus pursue a doctor who happens to be an old flame of Henry's.
episodes.title: Nip and Suck It

episodes.synopsis: An eccentric police consultant is brought in to interview Shawn, Gus, Lassiter and Juliet about their seemingly poor police work on a tough case.
episodes.title: No Trout About It

episodes.synopsis: Shawn and Gus dive into a world of mystery and melody to track down a playwright who once locked a critic in a theater that he burnt to the ground.
episodes.title: Psych: The Musical

episodes.synopsis: While Gus is in London at a Harry Potter convention, Interpol brings in Shawn to help with a sting operation targeting their most-wanted criminal.
episodes.title: Lock, Stock, Some Smoking Barrels and Burton Guster's Goblet of Fire

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to get his job back, Lassiter hunts for the man who tried to kill Trout at a press conference -- but he needs Gus and Shawn's help.
episodes.title: S.E.I.Z.E. the Day

episodes.synopsis: In this remake of Season 1's "Cloudy with a Chance of Murder," Shawn and Gus investigate the death of a womanizing weatherman.
episodes.title: Remake A.K.A. Cloudy ... with a Chance of Improvement

episodes.synopsis: When a man who claims he's been framed for murder takes Woody hostage at the morgue, Shawn and Gus try to get to the bottom of his story.
episodes.title: Someone's Got a Woody

episodes.synopsis: The victim of an apparent suicide bears a strange resemblance to Gus, who believes they're actually looking at a murder -- but Shawn isn't convinced.
episodes.title: Cog Blocked

episodes.synopsis: After Lassiter blows an interview to replace Vick as chief, he tries to redeem himself by diving into an old case: the murder of the mayor's uncle.
episodes.title: 1967: A Psych Odyssey

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of their favorite taco truck is murdered, Shawn and Gus go undercover as operators of their own food truck.
episodes.title: Shawn and Gus Truck Things Up

episodes.synopsis: When the host of a convention for paranormal crime consultants drops dead in front of the crowd, panelists Shawn and Gus investigate.
episodes.title: A Touch of Sweevil

episodes.synopsis: Plagued by relationship troubles, Gus is having trouble sleeping, so he goes to a dream therapist who believes that Shawn is actually the problem.
episodes.title: A Nightmare on State Street

episodes.synopsis: Shawn has to break the news to Gus that he's closing up shop and moving to San Francisco. But first, there's one final case to crack.
episodes.title: The Break-Up
